entry.title: Conference Paper
entry.content: Paper accepted in IEEE/ACM Symposium on Machine Learning for CAD on effective use of neural networks for automatic test pattern generation. Congratulations to first (and only student) author Lizi Zhang.
entry.summary: Paper accepted in IEEE/ACM Symposium on Machine Learning for CAD on effective use of neural networks for automatic test pattern generation. Congratulations to first (and only student) author Lizi Zhang.

entry.title: Travel Awards
entry.content: Congratulations to Robert for winning multiple travel awards to present his PhD research at DAC PhD Forum, SmartComp and MLSys Young Professional Symposium.
entry.summary: Congratulations to Robert for winning multiple travel awards to present his PhD research at DAC PhD Forum, SmartComp and MLSys Young Professional Symposium.
